original_title: My Little Pony Friendship Is Magic : Spice Up Your Life
overview: You should always make time for your friends, but when Applejacks chores keep getting in the way of her spending time with Rarity, whats a pony to do? Princess Twilight reads Starlight her favourite holiday story and learns the magic of the holiday season, and the importance of having friends to spend time with! Pinkie Pie and Rarity help out at a restaurant where the owner and his daughter keep arguing with each other, but soon they realise that being unique isnt bad at all!
title: My Little Pony Friendship Is Magic : Spice Up Your Life
